Aquila_Favonia.description: The sword of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evilâ€”just like the last heroine who wielded it.
Aquila_Favonia.name: Aquila Favonia
Aquila_Favonia.effect: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

Blackcliff_Longsword.description: A sword made of blackstone. It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.
Blackcliff_Longsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
Blackcliff_Longsword.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Cool_Steel.description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
Cool_Steel.name: Cool Steel
Cool_Steel.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.

Dark_Iron_Sword.description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.
Dark_Iron_Sword.name: Dark Iron Sword
Dark_Iron_Sword.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20% for 12s.

Dull_Blade.description: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.
Dull_Blade.name: Dull Blade

Favonius_Sword.description: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!
Favonius_Sword.name: Favonius Sword
Favonius_Sword.effect: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Festering_Desire.description: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
Festering_Desire.name: Festering Desire
Festering_Desire.obtained: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon Event
Festering_Desire.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%.

Fillet_Blade.description: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.
Fillet_Blade.name: Fillet Blade
Fillet_Blade.effect: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15s.

Harbinger_of_Dawn.description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
Harbinger_of_Dawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
Harbinger_of_Dawn.effect: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%.

Iron_Sting.description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
Iron_Sting.name: Iron Sting
Iron_Sting.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Sword Prototype, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Iron_Sting.effect: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

Lion_Roar.description: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.
Lion_Roar.name: Lion's Roar
Lion_Roar.effect: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%.

Prototype_Rancour.description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
Prototype_Rancour.name: Prototype Rancour
Prototype_Rancour.obtained:
- Adventure Rank 10 Reward
- Forging (1x Northlander Sword Prototype, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
- Stellar Reunion
Prototype_Rancour.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Royal_Longsword.description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
Royal_Longsword.name: Royal Longsword
Royal_Longsword.effect: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Sacrificial_Sword.description: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
Sacrificial_Sword.name: Sacrificial Sword
Sacrificial_Sword.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

Silver_Sword.description: A sword for chasing away demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.
Silver_Sword.name: Silver Sword

Skyrider_Sword.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
Skyrider_Sword.name: Skyrider Sword
Skyrider_Sword.effect: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Skyward_Blade.description: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
Skyward_Blade.name: Skyward Blade
Skyward_Blade.effect: Crit Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by 20% for 12s.

Summit_Shaper.description: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.
Summit_Shaper.name: Summit Shaper
Summit_Shaper.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Sword_of_Descension.description: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.
Sword_of_Descension.name: Sword of Descension
Sword_of_Descension.effect: Hitting enemies with Normal or Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

The_Alley_Flash.description: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.
The_Alley_Flash.name: The Alley Flash
The_Alley_Flash.effect: Continuously sprinting for at least 1s increases ATK by 28% for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

The_Black_Sword.description: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.
The_Black_Sword.name: The Black Sword
The_Black_Sword.effect:
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%.
Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

The_Flute.description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
The_Flute.name: The Flute
The_Flute.effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

Traveler_Handy_Sword.description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
Traveler_Handy_Sword.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
Traveler_Handy_Sword.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.
